name: Thick as Thieves
summary: Set in an alternate history Edinburgh, Thick as Thieves throws you into a world of supernatural intrigue. Society’s elite amass wealth and power, while the lower classes struggle to simply survive. It’s time to even the score. Team up with your fellow thieves and relieve the rich of their ill-gotten hoards. You’ll need your wits, a skillful crew and no small amount of luck to pull off daring heists. And if you get filthy rich in the process… who could hold that against you?
